name: ITI - The Information Technology Industry Council
goal:
The Information Technology Industry Council (ITI) is the premier ICT advocacy and policy organization for the world’s leading innovation companies. We have earned the trust of the world’s most recognized technology brands to solve their most complex policy challenges around the globe.

Based in Washington, DC, USA, ITI attracts members companies from Europe, Asia and North America that pioneer cutting-edge products and services that improve people’s daily lives. We collaborate with governments, industry, academia and civil society to develop and implement policies that promote economic expansion, job creation and unfettered access to the Internet and all it entails.
We opened the ITI Europe office in Brussels in October 2017
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Information Society, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Trade
euInitiatives: Directive 1025/2012, Privacy Shield, Digital Single Market initiative, European Accessibility Act. GDPR, Eprivacy, Platforms, Data flows,
